dialogues.speaker: tiger
text: Phew! After exercising, it's really hot!
후! 하! 운동을 하고 왔더니 정말 덥습니다!

dialogues.speaker: tiger
text: Do you like exercising? What kind of exercise do you like?
혹시 운동 좋아하십니까? 어떤 운동 좋아하십니까?
Shoot~~ Goal! I love soccer the most!
슛~~ 골! 저는 축구를 가장 좋아한답니다!
Huff, puff... Just thinking about it makes me tired. I don't like exercising~~

dialogues.speaker: tiger
answer: I love soccer too! There's a breakfast soccer match between the Tiger Team and the Lion Team this weekend. Come watch!
저도 축구 좋아합니다! 이번 주말에 호랑이팀과 사자팀 조식축구 경기가 있는데 보러오십시오!
Oh, I play badminton too! Let's have a match next time
오 저도 한 배드민턴 하는데! 다음에 한 판 붙으시죠!
There are many fun exercises out there! Give it a try sometime!
세상에는 재미있는 운동이 많답니다! 한번 해보시죠!

dialogues.speaker: tiger
text: I worked out hard today, so I should eat something delicious!
오늘 열심히 운동했으니 맛있는 걸 먹어야겠습니다!

dialogues.speaker: tiger
text: I'll go for this for today!
